document_notes.text:
This update for tiff fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-7006: Fixed null pointer dereference in tif_dirinfo.c (bsc#1228924)
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: A null pointer dereference flaw was found in Libtiff via `tif_dirinfo.c`. This issue may allow an attacker to trigger memory allocation failures through certain means, such as restricting the heap space size or injecting faults, causing a segmentation fault. This can cause an application crash, eventually leading to a denial of service.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
